jd: From: peter, Eminence Technology Solutions LLC peter@eminencets.com Reply to: peter@eminencets.com Role : Project ManagerLocation: Austin, TX – Hybrid JOB DESCRIPTIONThe traffic technology team is needing a project manager that has project management experience along with network experience to guide TxDOT and contractors to completion of many traffic related projects. A few projects that they will be working on, End of Life Equipment replacement, TMC Resiliency, SD WAN and the Flood Warning system expansion. Minimum Yrs of Experience, Skills, and Qualifications:8+ YearsExperience in delivering network projects, and products in a highly technical dispersed multi-team environment (of those 8 years, we would like at least 5 in Network project management).8+ YearsExperience to engage multiple technical teams to drive consistent expectations towards Project goals.8+ YearsKnowledge of Network Infrastructure.8+ YearsPossess strong verbal and written skills in communicating with peers and different levels of users including executive staff.8+ YearsSkilled in facilitating large group meetings with internal and external resources.8+ YearsSkilled in collaborating with the technical and functional teams to develop the Technical Specification and other documents need in support of the solutionPreferred Skills and Qualifications:Experience with Intelligent Transportation systems is a plusExperience with one or more of the state of Texas government agenciesExperience with multivendor and professional services.PMP certification is a plus.Experience with SDWAN projects Thanks and Regards,PeterRecruitment managerEminence Technology Solutions LLCEmail: Peter@eminencets.com Website: www.eminencets.com
